text: Hello AJ! Will do exactly that, thank you :slightly_smiling_face:
Anyone else ever have this problem? In the "Simple menu" I select "No link" and it still has a link attached to it.:man-shrugging::skin-tone-2:

Hey Guys,
what is the commonly used for custom blog pagination? I saw simplepagination.js? Any other tip?

Most developers use HubL for pagination
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/building-blocks/templates/blog-template-markup#listing-pagination>
an example from the code gallery:
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/code-gallery/entry/us/dontgojasonwaterfalls-blog-numbered-pagination>
Where can I find the CSS to stylize the "Simple menu"?
hello, can you remove the 'titles' from HubSpot ctas?
i need that pop up removed, i've tried js, didn't work.
Hey Jon, thank you for the reply, The one you posted was working only on default Blog right? I was asking about the Custom Blogs pagination
